candidates.notes: Stallone became the sixth actor (after Bing Crosby, Peter O'Toole, Al Pacino, Paul Newman, and Cate Blanchett) to be twice nominated for an Oscar for portraying the same character; he had previously portrayed Rocky Balboa in Rocky (1976).
